thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 25 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Fitch Says ‍Regional Variations Will Persist In Latin America's Major Housing Markets In 2018

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Fitch Says ‍Regional Variations Will Persist In Latin America's Major Housing Markets In 2018
text:
Jan 25 (Reuters) - Fitch:
* ‍FITCH SAYS MEXICO HOUSE PRICES STABLE, BRAZIL WILL BOTTOM IN 2018​
* FITCH SAYS EXPECTS BRAZILIAN COVERED BOND REGULATIONS TO HAVE A LIMITED EFFECT ON TOTAL MORTGAGE LENDING IN NEAR TERM
* FITCH SAYS ‍REGIONAL VARIATIONS WILL PERSIST IN LATIN AMERICA‘S MAJOR HOUSING MARKETS IN 2018
* ‍FITCH SAYS PRICES IN HOUSING MARKETS IN BRAZIL WILL STABILIZE WHILE MEXICO‘S MODERATE HOUSE PRICE GROWTH WILL BE SUSTAINED​ IN 2018 Source text for Eikon:
